Justice Ginsburg was known to pose the question, “What is the difference between a bookkeeper in the Garment District and a Supreme Court justice?” Her answer: “One generation.”

Replacing her with a justice who would threaten that progress and her legacy would be a travesty.

Trump and the Republicans have made it clear they will pick a justice who will get rid of the Affordable Care Act. It's a decision that could have devastating consequences for Americans across our country. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EjCPVs4XgAAwKwH.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1310702489633804289/vid/320x320/8cU9Z83h57lPT8nq.mp4?tag=13

We can’t let the infection that Trump has injected into the presidency and Congress—which has paralyzed our politics and pitted Americans against each other—spread to the Supreme Court.

This election is about more than the presidency or the Senate: it’s about our democracy.

Trump and Republicans’ relentless obsession with overturning the Affordable Care Act—driven entirely by a blind rage toward President Obama—is especially damaging at a moment when the country is suffering through a pandemic that has claimed more than 200,000 lives.

Trump and the Republicans are about to learn something. They may feel they have the power in this country. 

But they don’t. 

The American people have the power—at the ballot box.

When Justice Ginsburg passed away, not only did we lose a giant from the Court, but from American life. Few people in our history have done more to change more lives than she did as a lawyer, an advocate, and a Supreme Court Justice.

She was an inspiration for each of us.

American people deserve to have their voices heard when it comes to the next justice who serves on the Supreme Court. Tune in now as I respond LIVE to Trump’s nominee. https://www.pscp.tv/w/ckDUQTFXZ0tnR3lERERLdlB8MU95SkFnWXZ6YWFLYv5H8cwnKDAOFNYMYDlWEQ_Occs_imqGMmCFFAMmhtK8

🎓Make public colleges tuition-free

🚰Provide clean drinking water to all
🏡End homelessness

Yes. The 1% have got to pay their fair share of taxes.
